PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: SearchDefaultBaseDN
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Default Base DN for LDAP Searches

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapAdminUserDN
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: User DN for the LDAP admin account.

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapAdminUserPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password of the LDAP admin user account.

PropertyDefinition.Name: RestrictToObjectClass
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Restrict Searches To Named Object Class
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Restrict Searches to objectClass named in the Name field for a table

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapTxnTimeoutInMillis
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Timeout value for LDAP searches. Defaults to TCP timeout value.

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapUrl
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Ldap URL of the server, including port number.
